# Introduction to Immoswiss Package

## Installation

To install the Immoswiss package, use the following command:

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("immoswiss")
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
# Example usage of estimate_price()
result <- estimate_price(2, 100, 1004, lausanne)
print(result)
```
